text: - My name is Pierre Gustafsson.
I work at Ericsson,

heading up business management
functions for AI at Ericsson.
We at Ericsson,

we've been working with AI
and LLMs for a long time.
The last few years,
we've worked specifically how to fine-tune
and build LLMs for telecom.
ELI is Ericsson Language Intelligence.

That's how we have attacked
and adopted LLMs in Ericsson.

GenAI has created a boom
for the whole industry.

AI used to be something that
we did in the background.

Now, when it's in the
hands of the consumers,
things are happening really, really fast.

So DTW this year, it's
a lot of focus on AI.
We have two demos here, Ericsson and AWS.

One which is pretty large,
focusing on Talkto Network,
making the intelligent interaction
with the telecom networks.
And another one that's more focused
on how you automatically slice
and scale the 5G networks.
The collaboration we have with Ericsson

and AWS is really,
really important for us.

Ericsson with its large
telecom background,

AWS being a large player
with the cloud environment

and having a lot of
knowledge in AI and LM,
putting that partner
and strategic collaboration together
is gonna make a very big difference
for the telecom industry.
(bright upbeat music)
